name: Defending your Values
description: This is my first NFT. All my life I have been drawing and digitizing my artwork. I have exhibited many times over my career through solo exhibitions and group ones. My latest work, that has not yet been exhibited, is a combination of old hand made drawings combined with my latest digital skills. As an artists I see my future turning more in this direction because of the actual result, result that only concerns the quality of the artwork. Defending your Values, expresses a personal feeling, the one of doing nothing for no reason.
